Package io.servicetalk.transport.api

Class DelegatingServerSslConfig

java.lang.Object
io.servicetalk.transport.api.DelegatingSslConfig<ServerSslConfig>
io.servicetalk.transport.api.DelegatingServerSslConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerSslConfig, SslConfig
public class DelegatingServerSslConfig extends DelegatingSslConfig<ServerSslConfig> implements ServerSslConfig
Wrap a ServerSslConfig and delegate all methods to it.
